sentences.en: I find their behaviour morally reprehensible .
sentences.cn: 我认为他们的行为应该受到道德谴责。

sentences.en: My admittedly somewhat speculative, are that they probably do not consider their actions as reprehensible.
sentences.cn: 以笔者揣想, 他们大概是认为此等行为无可指摘.

sentences.en: She was not reprehensible in any way - just a full - blood animal glowing with a love of life.
sentences.cn: 她是完全不应该受人非难的 -- 她只是个多血质的动物,由于热爱生活而红光焕发.

words.tran_cn: 应受责难地；应受斥责地

trans.tran_en: reprehensible behaviour is very bad and deserves criticism
